word.description: Lubricant applied to the terminals in the manufacturing process to provide an additional measure against fretting corrosion.
Designed to minimize physical effort and discomfort and maximize efficiency.
Parts molded from resins enabling compliance with IEC 60335-1 (Household and Similar Electrical Appliances â€“ Safety) standard.
Provides extra measure of assurance when inserting the contact into the housing.
Provides appropriate alignment between housing and headers.
Terminal Positional Assurance; prevents terminal back-outs between housings and electrical contacts.
